price: 103. Ils se diront les uns aux autres en chuchotant : « Vous n’êtes restés guère plus de dix (jours en ce bas monde). »
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
